) [inline]

load previously recorded data

load previously recorded data as many channels in a list (i.e. CImgList container)

Note:
all channels should have the same size (i.e. 1D data with same width)
Parameters:
[in] file_name file name (e.g. "data.nc")
[in] var_names variable names (i.e. the requested list of channels;e.g. "pressure, hot_wire, square_wave, control_signal")
[out] unit_names variable unit names (i.e. unit names of channels; e.g. "Pa","m/s","V","volt")
[out] dim_names dimension name (i.e. only one dimension name in the list as channels are 1D data; e.g. "time")
[out] channels data as physical values (i.e. all requested channels in the data list)
[out] ... 
Note:
code progress: data from CImg to CImgList . DONE
code progress: function as template. DONE

save recorded data and additional informations

save all recoreded data regarding to a single time axis (in order to display it with time axis under ncview for example)

Note:
each recorded channel is also written with its corresponding time axis (especially with the channel name prefix)
